experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Beyond Tekhmamek is a Social Enterprise that envisions to make a shift in the educational system by changing what and how students are being taught. • Managing 52 members including 6 part-timers.• Raised $10k in grants and income from operations.• More than 1k students attended our workshops at 10 school partners.• Extensive collaboration with Embassies as well as NGOs and UN agencies.
experience.description_html: Beyond Tekhmamek is a Social Enterprise that envisions to make a shift in the educational system by changing what and how students are being taught. • Managing 52 members including 6 part-timers.• Raised $10k in grants and income from operations.• More than 1k students attended our workshops at 10 school partners.• Extensive collaboration with Embassies as well as NGOs and UN agencies. <!---->

experience.title: Young People's Action Team Member
experience.description: GenU is a global, multi-sector partnership, aprt of UNICEF that bridges the educational gap enabling young people to become productive members of society• Identified and supported the implementation of strategies to actively upskill the youth by influencing the governance towards the skills that we deem high on the agenda.• Supported the development of advocacy material for GenU interventions in the areas of employability, entrepreneurship, and training to be used with the global board.
experience.description_html: GenU is a global, multi-sector partnership, aprt of UNICEF that bridges the educational gap enabling young people to become productive members of society• Identified and supported the implementation of strategies to actively upskill the youth by influencing the governance towards the skills that we deem high on the agenda.• Supported the development of advocacy material for GenU interventions in the areas of employability, entrepreneurship, and training to be used with the global board.

experience.title: Research And Development Intern
experience.description: Education institution with B2B and B2C channels focused on teaching STEM• Analyzed recruiting, teaching, internal communication processes, and identified gaps.• Developed a training covering the gaps using my robotics teaching skills by composing a digital lesson plan template that drives mentors to teach interactively.• Designed a clearer hierarchy for the 20 mentors, establishing a vertical hierarchy to enable employee’s growth within the company.• Resulted in an improved internal communication process across the 30 employees, improved employee retention by 15% at mid and upper level mentors’ roles.
experience.description_html: Education institution with B2B and B2C channels focused on teaching STEM• Analyzed recruiting, teaching, internal communication processes, and identified gaps.• Developed a training covering the gaps using my robotics teaching skills by composing a digital lesson plan template that drives mentors to teach interactively.• Designed a clearer hierarchy for the 20 mentors, establishing a vertical hierarchy to enable employee’s growth within the company.• Resulted in an improved internal communication process across the 30 employees, improved employee retention by 15% at mid and upper level mentors’ roles.
